DOC.brief_summary: This phase 2 open-label , multicenter , non-randomized study evaluate safety efficacy oral pazopanib neoadjuvant treatment patient stage 1A , 1B , IIA IIB ( T2 ) resectable Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer ( NSCLC ) .
